name: XRRigidTransform.orientation
description: The read-only XRRigidTransform property orientation is a DOMPointReadOnly containing a normalized quaternion (also called a unit quaternion or versor) specifying the rotational component of the transform represented by the object.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRRigidTransform.orientation' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
